Drawdown Parameter.Name: Drawdown Parameter
Drawdown Parameter.Description: specify the thermal drawdown for reservoir model 3 and 4
Drawdown Parameter.Units: kg/s/m2 if reservoir model = 3, 1/year if reservoir model = 4

TOUGH2 Model/File Name.Name: TOUGH2 Model/File Name
TOUGH2 Model/File Name.Description: File name of reservoir output in case reservoir model 5 is selected

Production Wellbore Temperature Drop.Name: Production Wellbore Temperature Drop
Production Wellbore Temperature Drop.Description: Specify constant production well geofluid temperature drop in case Ramey’s model is disabled.

Fracture Shape.Name: Fracture Shape
Fracture Shape.Description: Specifies the shape of the (identical) fractures in a fracture-based reservoir
Fracture Shape.AllowableValues: 1: Circular fracture with known area, 2: Circular fracture with known diameter, 3: Square fracture, 4: Rectangular fracture

Fracture Area.Name: Fracture Area
Fracture Area.Description: Effective heat transfer area per fracture
Fracture Area.WhenRequired: If reservoir model = 1 or 2 and fracture shape = 1

Fracture Height.Name: Fracture Height
Fracture Height.Description: Diameter (if fracture shape = 2) or height (if fracture shape = 3 or 4) of each fracture
Fracture Height.WhenRequired: If reservoir model = 1 or 2 and fracture shape = 2, 3 or 4

Fracture Width.Name: Fracture Width
Fracture Width.WhenRequired: If reservoir model = 1 or 2 and fracture shape = 4

Number of Fractures.Name: Number of Fractures
Number of Fractures.Description: Number of identical parallel fractures in EGS fracture-based reservoir model.
Number of Fractures.WhenRequired: If reservoir model = 1 or 2 and reservoir volume option = 1 or 3

Fracture Separation.Name: Fracture Separation
Fracture Separation.Description: Separation of identical parallel fractures with uniform spatial distribution in EGS fracture-based reservoir.
Fracture Separation.WhenRequired: If reservoir model = 1 or 2 and reservoir volume option = 1 or 2

Productivity Index.Name: Productivity Index
Productivity Index.Description: Productivity index defined as ratio of production well flow rate over production well inflow pressure drop (hydrostatic reservoir pressure – flowing bottom hole pressure).
Productivity Index.WhenRequired: Required if not specifying reservoir impedance and no flash power plant considered

Injectivity Index.Name: Injectivity Index
Injectivity Index.Description: Injectivity index defined as ratio of injection well flow rate over injection well outflow pressure drop (flowing bottom hole pressure - hydrostatic reservoir pressure).
Injectivity Index.WhenRequired: Required if not specifying reservoir impedance

Plant Outlet Pressure.Name: Plant Outlet Pressure
Plant Outlet Pressure.Description: Constant plant outlet pressure equal to injection well pump(s) suction pressure - must be set to 100 kPa(1 bar) in case of flash power plant

Maximum Drawdown.Name: Maximum Drawdown
Maximum Drawdown.Description: Maximum allowable thermal drawdown before redrilling of all wells into new reservoir (most applicable to EGS-type reservoirs with heat farming strategies). E.g. a value of 0.2 means that all wells are redrilled after the production temperature (at the wellhead) has dropped by 20% of its initial temperature.

Reservoir Porosity.Name: Reservoir Porosity
Reservoir Porosity.WhenRequired: If reservoir model = 2, or reservoir model = 6 and use of built-in TOUGH2 model

Reservoir Permeability.Name: Reservoir Permeability
Reservoir Permeability.WhenRequired: If reservoir model = 6 and use of built-in TOUGH2 model

Reservoir Thickness.Name: Reservoir Thickness
Reservoir Thickness.Description: Reservoir thickness for built-in TOUGH2 doublet reservoir model
Reservoir Thickness.WhenRequired: If reservoir model = 6 and use of built-in TOUGH2 model

Reservoir Width.Name: Reservoir Width
Reservoir Width.Description: Reservoir width for built-in TOUGH2 doublet reservoir model
Reservoir Width.WhenRequired: If reservoir model = 6 and use of built-in TOUGH2 model

Well Separation.Name: Well Separation
Well Separation.Description: Well separation for built-in TOUGH2 doublet reservoir model
Well Separation.WhenRequired: If reservoir model = 6 and use of built-in TOUGH2 model

Power Plant Type.Name: Power Plant Type
Power Plant Type.Description: Specify the type of power plant in case of electricity generation
Power Plant Type.AllowableValues: 1: Subcritical ORC, 2: Supercritical ORC, 3: Single-flash, 4: Double-flash
Power Plant Type.WhenRequired: If the end-use option is 1, 31, 32, 41, 42, 51, or 52

CHP Fraction.Name: CHP Fraction
CHP Fraction.Description: Fraction of produced geofluid flow rate going to direct-use heat application in CHP parallel cycle
CHP Fraction.WhenRequired: If the end-use option is 51 or 52

CHP Bottoming Entering Temperature.Name: CHP Bottoming Entering Temperature
CHP Bottoming Entering Temperature.Description: Power plant entering geofluid temperature used in CHP bottoming cycle
CHP Bottoming Entering Temperature.WhenRequired: If the end-use option is 41 or 42

Fixed Charge Rate.Name: Fixed Charge Rate
Fixed Charge Rate.Description: Fixed charge rate (FCR) used in the Fixed Charge Rate Model

Discount Rate.Name: Discount Rate
Discount Rate.Description: Discount rate used in the Standard Levelized Cost Model

Total Capital Cost.Name: Total Capital Cost
Total Capital Cost.Category: Capital and O & M Cost Parameters
Total Capital Cost.Description: Total initial capital cost (not including Tax breaks, incentives, & grants). If not provided or out of range, GEOPHIRES will calculate total capital cost using built-in correlation.

Well Drilling and Completion Capital Cos.Name: Well Drilling and Completion Capital Cost
Well Drilling and Completion Capital Cos.Category: Capital and O & M Cost Parameters
Well Drilling and Completion Capital Cos.Description: Total fixed drilling and completion capital cost per well. If not provided or out of range, GEOPHIRES will calculate well drilling and completion capital cost using built-in correlation.

Reservoir Stimulation Capital Cost.Name: Reservoir Stimulation Capital Cost
Reservoir Stimulation Capital Cost.Category: Capital and O & M Cost Parameters
Reservoir Stimulation Capital Cost.Description: Total reservoir stimulation capital cost. If not provided or out of range, GEOPHIRES will calculate well drilling and completion capital cost using built-in correlation.

Surface Plant Capital Cost.Name: Surface Plant Capital Cost
Surface Plant Capital Cost.Category: Capital and O & M Cost Parameters
Surface Plant Capital Cost.Description: Total surface plant capital cost. If not provided or out of range, GEOPHIRES will calculate surface plant capital cost using built-in correlation.

Field Gathering System Capital Cost.Name: Field Gathering System Capital Cost
Field Gathering System Capital Cost.Category: Capital and O & M Cost Parameters
Field Gathering System Capital Cost.Description: Total field gathering system capital cost. If not provided or out of range, GEOPHIRES will calculate field gathering system capital cost using built-in correlation.

Exploration Capital Cost.Name: Exploration Capital Cost
Exploration Capital Cost.Category: Capital and O & M Cost Parameters
Exploration Capital Cost.Description: Total exploration capital cost. If not provided or out of range, GEOPHIRES will calculate exploration capital cost using built-in correlation.

Total O&M Cost.Name: Total O&M Cost
Total O&M Cost.Category: Capital and O & M Cost Parameters
Total O&M Cost.Description: Total initial O&M cost. If not provided or out of range, GEOPHIRES will calculate total O&M cost using built-in O&M cost correlations for each plant component.

Wellfield O&M Cost.Name: Wellfield O&M Cost
Wellfield O&M Cost.Category: Capital and O & M Cost Parameters
Wellfield O&M Cost.Description: Total annual wellfield O&M cost. If not provided or out of range, GEOPHIRES will calculate annual wellfield O&M cost using built-in correlation.

Surface Plant O&M Cost.Name: Surface Plant O&M Cost
Surface Plant O&M Cost.Category: Capital and O & M Cost Parameters
Surface Plant O&M Cost.Description: Total annual surface plant O&M cost. If not provided or out of range, GEOPHIRES will calculate annual surface plant O&M cost using built-in correlation.

Water Cost.Name: Water Cost
Water Cost.Category: Capital and O & M Cost Parameters
Water Cost.Description: Total annual make-up water cost. If not provided or out of range, GEOPHIRES will calculate annual make-up water cost using built-in correlation.

Heat Rate.Name: Heat Rate
Heat Rate.Category: Capital and O & M Cost Parameters
Heat Rate.Description: Price of heat to calculate revenue from heat sales in CHP mode.
Heat Rate.WhenRequired: In case end - use option = 31, 41, or 51

Fixed Internal Rate.Name: Fixed Internal Rate
Fixed Internal Rate.Description: The discount rate over the length of the plant life (for NPV calculation)

Plant Construction.Name: Plant Construction
Plant Construction.Description: Number of years it will take to construction and start the entire physical plant (i.e, years before startup)

Add1ElecGained.Name: Add1ElecGained
Add1ElecGained.Description: Amount of electrictity added/subtracted from output

Add2ElecGained.Name: Add2ElecGained
Add2ElecGained.Description: Amount of electrictity added/subtracted from output

Add3ElecGained.Name: Add3ElecGained
Add3ElecGained.Description: Amount of electrictity added/subtracted from output

Add4ElecGained.Name: Add4ElecGained
Add4ElecGained.Description: Amount of electrictity added/subtracted from output

Add5ElecGained.Name: Add5ElecGained
Add5ElecGained.Description: Amount of electrictity added/subtracted from output

Add1HeatGained.Name: Add1HeatGained
Add1HeatGained.Description: Amount of heat added/subtracted from output

Add2HeatGained.Name: Add2HeatGained
Add2HeatGained.Description: Amount of heat added/subtracted from output

Add3HeatGained.Name: Add3HeatGained
Add3HeatGained.Description: Amount of heat added/subtracted from output

Add4HeatGained.Name: Add4HeatGained
Add4HeatGained.Description: Amount of heat added/subtracted from output

Add5HeatGained.Name: Add5HeatGained
Add5HeatGained.Description: Amount of heat added/subtracted from output

Add1AdditionalProfit.Name: Add1AdditionalProfit
Add1AdditionalProfit.Description: Profit add/subtracted by adding this option

Add2AdditionalProfit.Name: Add2AdditionalProfit
Add2AdditionalProfit.Description: Profit add/subtracted by adding this option

Add3AdditionalProfit.Name: Add3AdditionalProfit
Add3AdditionalProfit.Description: Profit add/subtracted by adding this option

Add4AdditionalProfit.Name: Add4AdditionalProfit
Add4AdditionalProfit.Description: Profit add/subtracted by adding this option

Add5AdditionalProfit.Name: Add5AdditionalProfit
Add5AdditionalProfit.Description: Profit add/subtracted by adding this option

CCUSYearsAfterStart.Name: CCUSYearsAfterStart
CCUSYearsAfterStart.Description: The year (after start of plant) that the initial price kicks in

CCUSEscalationStart.Name: CCUSEscalationStart
CCUSEscalationStart.Description: The year (after start of plant) that the price escalation kicks in

CCUSEscalationRate.Name: CCUSEscalationRate
CCUSEscalationRate.Description: The rate at which the escalation rises

CCUSGridCO2.Name: CCUSGridCO2
CCUSGridCO2.Description: The amount of carbon produced by the grid (that will no longer be released due to plant installation; depends on nature of sources of grid power at the location)

ElecStartPrice.Name: ElecStartPrice
ElecStartPrice.Description: Initial price electricity will be sold

ElecEndPrice.Name: ElecEndPrice
ElecEndPrice.Description: Final price electricity will be sold

ElecEscalationStart.Name: ElecEscalationStart
ElecEscalationStart.Description: The year (after start of plant) that the price escalation kicks in

ElecEscalationRate.Name: ElecEscalationRate
ElecEscalationRate.Description: The rate at which the escalation rises

HeatStartPrice.Name: HeatStartPrice
HeatStartPrice.Description: Initial price heat will be sold

HeatEndPrice.Name: HeatEndPrice
HeatEndPrice.Description: Final price heat will be sold

HeatEscalationStart.Name: HeatEscalationStart
HeatEscalationStart.Description: The year (after start of plant) that the price escalation kicks in

HeatEscalationRate.Name: HeatEscalationRate
HeatEscalationRate.Description: The rate at which the escaltion rises

Total Grant.Name: Total Grant
Total Grant.Description: Amount of grant money awarded to project which will be applied to reduce total CAPEX

Tax Relief.Name: Tax Relief
Tax Relief.Description: Tax relief awarded to the project as a precentage of CAPEX (not including 45Q, if that applies)

Other Incentives.Name: Other Incentives
Other Incentives.Description: Other incentives awarded to project which will be applied to reduce total CAPEX

CarbonModel.Name: CarbonModel
CarbonModel.Description: True False about use of Carbon Tax Model

Annual License etc.Name: Annual License etc
Annual License etc.Description: Annual License, Royalty, Fees, etc. combined

Flat License etc.Name: Flat License etc
Flat License etc.Description: License, Royalty, Fees, etc. as a single upfront flat charge combined

LACE Target.Name: LACE Target
LACE Target.Description: Predetermined LACE (levelized Avoided Cost of Electricity, US EIA)

LACE Year.Name: LACE Year
LACE Year.Description: The year the plant will come online (used by LACE calculation)

LACE Region.Name: LACE Region
LACE Region.Description: The region in which the plant will come online (used by LACE calculation)

Reservoir Output File Name.Name: Reservoir Output File Name
Reservoir Output File Name.Description: File name of reservoir output in case reservoir model 5 is selected

Number of Segments.Name: Number of Segments
Number of Segments.Description: Number of rock segments from surface to reservoir depth with specific geothermal gradient

Production Well Diameter.Name: Production Well Diameter
Production Well Diameter.Description: Inner diameter of production wellbore (assumed constant along the wellbore) to calculate frictional pressure drop and wellbore heat transmission with Ramey’s model

Injection Well Diameter.Name: Injection Well Diameter
Injection Well Diameter.Description: Inner diameter of injection wellbore (assumed constant along the wellbore) to calculate frictional pressure drop

Injection Wellbore Temperature Gain.Name: Injection Wellbore Temperature Gain
Injection Wellbore Temperature Gain.Description: Specify constant injection well geofluid temperature gain.

Production Flow Rate per Well.Name: Production Flow Rate per Well
Production Flow Rate per Well.Description: Geofluid flow rate per production well.

Maximum Temperature.Name: Maximum Temperature
Maximum Temperature.Description: Maximum allowable reservoir temperature (e.g. due to drill bit or logging tools constraints). GEOPHIRES will cap the drilling depth to stay below this maximum temperature.

Reservoir Volume Option.Name: Reservoir Volume Option
Reservoir Volume Option.Description: Specifies how the reservoir volume, and fracture distribution (for reservoir models 1 and 2) are calculated. The reservoir volume is used by GEOPHIRES to estimate the stored heat in place. The fracture distribution is needed as input for the EGS fracture-based reservoir models 1 and 2.
Reservoir Volume Option.AllowableValues: 1: Specify number of fractures and fracture separation, 2: Specify reservoir volume and fracture separation, 3: Specify reservoir volume and number of fractures, 4: Specify reservoir volume only (sufficient for reservoir models 3, 4, 5 and 6)

Water Loss Fraction.Name: Water Loss Fraction
Water Loss Fraction.Description: Fraction of water lost in the reservoir defined as (total geofluid lost)/(total geofluid produced). The total injection flow rate is then calculated as: (injection rate) = (production rate) × (1+ water loss fraction)

Reservoir Impedance.Name: Reservoir Impedance
Reservoir Impedance.Description: Reservoir resistance to flow per well-pair. For EGS-type reservoirs when the injection well is in hydraulic communication with the production well, this parameter specifies the overall pressure drop in the reservoir between injection well and production well, calculated as (reservoir impedance) × (reservoir flow rate).
Reservoir Impedance.WhenRequired: Optional; default is specifying productivity and injectivity indices

Injection Temperature.Name: Injection Temperature
Injection Temperature.Description: Constant geofluid injection temperature at injection wellhead.

Reservoir Heat Capacity.Name: Reservoir Heat Capacity
Reservoir Heat Capacity.Description: Constant and uniform reservoir rock heat capacity

Reservoir Density.Name: Reservoir Density
Reservoir Density.Description: Constant and uniform reservoir rock density

Reservoir Thermal Conductivity.Name: Reservoir Thermal Conductivity
Reservoir Thermal Conductivity.Description: Constant and uniform reservoir rock thermal conductivity
Reservoir Thermal Conductivity.WhenRequired: If use of Ramey model, or reservoir model = 1, 2 or 3, or reservoir model = 6 and use of built-in TOUGH2 model

End-Use Option.Name: End-Use Option
End-Use Option.Description: Select the end-use application of the geofluid heat
End-Use Option.AllowableValues: 1: Electricity: All the geothermal fluid heat is used to generate electricity(with a certain conversion heat - to - power conversion efficiency.The levelized cost of energy is expressed as levelized cost of electricity(LCOE) in ¢/ kWhe. 2: Direct - Use Heat: All the geothermal fluid heat is directly used as heat.The levelized cost of energy is expressed as levelized cost of heat(LCOH) in $/ MMBTU. 3X: CHP Topping Cycle: An electricity generation cycle(high temperature) is in series with direct - use heat(low temperature). 31: The levelized cost of energy is calculated as LCOE (¢/ kWhe) with electricity considered the main product, and the heat sales considered an additional revenue stream subtracted from the annual O & M costs. 32: The levelized cost of energy is calculated as LCOH ($/ MMBTU) with heat considered the main product, and the electricity sales considered an additional revenue stream subtracted from the annual O & M costs. 4X: CHP Bottoming Cycle: A direct-use heat application (high temperature) is in series with an electricity generation cycle (low temperature). 41: The levelized cost of energy is calculated as LCOE (¢/ kWhe) with electricity considered the main product, and the heat sales considered an additional revenue stream subtracted from the annual O & M costs. 42: The levelized cost of energy is calculated as LCOH ($/ MMBTU) with heat considered the main product, and the electricity sales considered an additional revenue stream subtracted from the annual O & M costs. 5X: CHP Parallel Cycle: The geothermal fluid flow splits in two parts two serve an electricity generation cycle in parallel with direct - use heat, both at the same temperature. 51: The levelized cost of energy is calculated as LCOE (¢/ kWhe) with electricity considered the main product, and the heat sales considered an additional revenue stream subtracted from the annual O & M costs. 52: The levelized cost of energy is calculated as LCOH ($/ MMBTU) with heat considered the main product, and the electricity sales considered an additional revenue stream subtracted from the annual O & M costs.

Circulation Pump Efficiency.Name: Circulation Pump Efficiency
Circulation Pump Efficiency.Description: Specify the overall efficiency of the injection and production well pumps

Utilization Factor.Name: Utilization Factor
Utilization Factor.Description: Ratio of the time the plant is running in normal production in a 1-year time period.

Surface Temperature.Name: Surface Temperature
Surface Temperature.Description: Surface temperature used for calculating bottom-hole temperature (with geothermal gradient and reservoir depth)

Ambient Temperature.Name: Ambient Temperature
Ambient Temperature.Description: Ambient (or dead-state) temperature used for calculating power plant utilization efficiency
Ambient Temperature.WhenRequired: If the end-use option is 1, 31, 32, 41, 42, 51, or 52

End-Use Efficiency Factor.Name: End-Use Efficiency Factor
End-Use Efficiency Factor.Description: Constant thermal efficiency of the direct-use application
End-Use Efficiency Factor.WhenRequired: If the end-use option is 2, 31, 32, 41, 42, 51, or 52

Economic Model.Name: Economic Model
Economic Model.Description: Specify the economic model to calculate the levelized cost of energy
Economic Model.AllowableValues: 1: Fixed Charge Rate Model, 2: Standard Levelized Cost Model, 3: BICYCLE Levelized Cost Model

Fraction of Investment in Bonds.Name: Fraction of Investment in Bonds
Fraction of Investment in Bonds.Description: Fraction of geothermal project financing through bonds (debt); the remaining will be through equity.

Inflated Bond Interest Rate.Name: Inflated Bond Interest Rate
Inflated Bond Interest Rate.Description: Inflated bond interest rate, defined as: (1+inflated bond interest rate) = (1 + deflated bond interest rate)×(1 + interest rate). This parameter characterizes the cost of debt.

Inflated Equity Interest Rate.Name: Inflated Equity Interest Rate
Inflated Equity Interest Rate.Description: Inflated equity interest rate, defined as: (1+inflated equity interest rate) = (1 + deflated equity interest rate)×(1 + interest rate). This parameter characterizes the cost of equity.

Combined Income Tax Rate.Name: Combined Income Tax Rate
Combined Income Tax Rate.Description: Combined income tax rate. Income taxes in each year are calculated using (combined income tax rate) × (revenue – deductible expenses) – investment tax credits.

Gross Revenue Tax Rate.Name: Gross Revenue Tax Rate
Gross Revenue Tax Rate.Description: Gross revenue tax rate. Gross revenue taxes in each year are calculated using (gross revenue tax rate) × (revenue).

Investment Tax Credit Rate.Name: Investment Tax Credit Rate
Investment Tax Credit Rate.Description: Investment tax credit rate. Investment tax credits are calculated using (investment tax credit rate) × (initial capital investment).

Property Tax Rate.Name: Property Tax Rate
Property Tax Rate.Description: Property tax rate. Property taxes are fixed annual charges and are calculated using (property tax rate) × (initial capital investment).

Well Drilling and Completion Capital Cos.Name: Well Drilling and Completion Capital Cost Adjustment Factor
Well Drilling and Completion Capital Cos.Category: Capital and O & M Cost Parameters
Well Drilling and Completion Capital Cos.Description: Multiplier for built-in well drilling and completion capital cost correlation
Well Drilling and Completion Capital Cos.WhenRequired: If no well drilling and completion capital cost number provided

Well Drilling Cost Correlation.Name: Well Drilling Cost Correlation
Well Drilling Cost Correlation.Category: Capital and O & M Cost Parameters
Well Drilling Cost Correlation.Description: Select the built-in well drilling and completion cost correlation
Well Drilling Cost Correlation.AllowableValues: 1: vertical open - hole, small diameter, 2: deviated liner, small diameter, 3: vertical open - hole, large diameter, 4: deviated liner, large diameter
Well Drilling Cost Correlation.WhenRequired: If no valid fixed well drilling and completion capital cost is provided

Reservoir Stimulation Capital Cost Adjus.Name: Reservoir Stimulation Capital Cost Adjustment Factor
Reservoir Stimulation Capital Cost Adjus.Category: Capital and O & M Cost Parameters
Reservoir Stimulation Capital Cost Adjus.Description: Multiplier for built-in reservoir stimulation capital cost correlation
Reservoir Stimulation Capital Cost Adjus.WhenRequired: If no reservoir stimulation capital cost number provided

Surface Plant Capital Cost Adjustment Fa.Name: Surface Plant Capital Cost Adjustment Factor
Surface Plant Capital Cost Adjustment Fa.Category: Capital and O & M Cost Parameters
Surface Plant Capital Cost Adjustment Fa.Description: Multiplier for built-in surface plant capital cost correlation
Surface Plant Capital Cost Adjustment Fa.WhenRequired: If no surface plant capital cost number provided

Field Gathering System Capital Cost Adju.Name: Field Gathering System Capital Cost Adjustment Factor
Field Gathering System Capital Cost Adju.Category: Capital and O & M Cost Parameters
Field Gathering System Capital Cost Adju.Description: Multiplier for built-in field gathering system capital cost correlation
Field Gathering System Capital Cost Adju.WhenRequired: If no field gathering system capital cost number provided

Exploration Capital Cost Adjustment Fact.Name: Exploration Capital Cost Adjustment Factor
Exploration Capital Cost Adjustment Fact.Category: Capital and O & M Cost Parameters
Exploration Capital Cost Adjustment Fact.Description: Multiplier for built-in exploration capital cost correlation
Exploration Capital Cost Adjustment Fact.WhenRequired: If no exploration capital cost number provided

Wellfield O&M Cost Adjustment Factor.Name: Wellfield O&M Cost Adjustment Factor
Wellfield O&M Cost Adjustment Factor.Category: Capital and O & M Cost Parameters
Wellfield O&M Cost Adjustment Factor.Description: Multiplier for built-in wellfield O&M cost correlation
Wellfield O&M Cost Adjustment Factor.WhenRequired: If no annual wellfield O&M cost number provided

Water Cost Adjustment Factor.Name: Water Cost Adjustment Factor
Water Cost Adjustment Factor.Category: Capital and O & M Cost Parameters
Water Cost Adjustment Factor.Description: Multiplier for built-in make-up water cost correlation
Water Cost Adjustment Factor.WhenRequired: If no annual make-up water cost number provided

Surface Plant O&M Cost Adjustment Factor.Name: Surface Plant O&M Cost Adjustment Factor
Surface Plant O&M Cost Adjustment Factor.Category: Capital and O & M Cost Parameters
Surface Plant O&M Cost Adjustment Factor.Description: Multiplier for built-in surface plant O&M cost correlation
Surface Plant O&M Cost Adjustment Factor.WhenRequired: If no annual surface plant O&M cost number provided

Inflation Rate During Construction.Name: Inflation Rate During Construction
Inflation Rate During Construction.Description: Initial capital investment can be inflated with this inflation rate during construction before annual revenue kicks in.

Electricity Rate.Name: Electricity Rate
Electricity Rate.Category: Capital and O & M Cost Parameters
Electricity Rate.Description: Price of electricity to calculate pumping costs in direct-use heat only mode or revenue from electricity sales in CHP mode.
Electricity Rate.WhenRequired: In case end - use option = 2, 32, 42, or 52

Print Output to Console.Name: Print Output to Console
Print Output to Console.Description: Select whether to print simulation results to the console screen

Time steps per year.Name: Time steps per year
Time steps per year.Description: Number of internal simulation time steps per year

ElecOnly.Name: ElecOnly
ElecOnly.Description: True False about nature of electrical output

HeatOnly.Name: HeatOnly
HeatOnly.Description: True False about nature of heat output

Ramey Production Wellbore Model.Name: Ramey Production Wellbore Model
Ramey Production Wellbore Model.Description: Select whether to use Ramey’s model to estimate the geofluid temperature drop in the production wells.

Reservoir Model.Name: Reservoir Model
Reservoir Model.Description: Select the reservoir model to be used in GEOPHIRES
Reservoir Model.AllowableValues: 1: Multiple parallel fractures model, 2: 1D linear heat sweep model, 3: m / a single fracture drawdown model, 4: Linear thermal drawdown model, 5: Generic user - provided temperature profile, 6: TOUGH2
